attributes.comment:
Sir,
After reading the proposed fee hikes in the petition, I have following suggestions :
1) small & medium employers are already suffering due to back log of green
cards which is now around 5 to 7 years for employment based category. If you
increase the fees for H1B & I-485, it is going to hurt lot of small companies & its
employees due to additional financial burden.
2) You are already charging additional $1000 for premium processing to expedite
the petition, which is already being utilised by most of the applicants because
they are not getting any thing done from the dept in a reasonable time with
standard fees.
3) I would accept the proposed fee hike if you eliminate the premium processing
fee & issue all the I-129,I-797,I-140's in 45 days without any excuses.
4) I would also accept the proposed fee hike for I-485's if you reduce the
processing time to 90 days .
There should be some fiscal responsibility by the dept before hiking the fees to
demonstrate that they are going to become more efficient by increasing the fees,
and if that is not the case, fees should not be increased.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
